lead_paragraph: The Rev. Lawrence Boadt, a Roman Catholic priest, publisher and Bible scholar who used his study of the Old Testament as a vehicle for promoting understanding between Christians and Jews, died on Saturday at his home in Mahwah, N.J. He was 67. The cause was cancer, said Stefani Manowski, media director of the Paulist Fathers, Father Boadt's order.
snippet: Father Boadt was a Roman Catholic priest, publisher and Bible scholar who used his study of the Old Testament as a vehicle for promoting understanding between Christians and Jews.

headline.main: Lawrence Boadt, Priest and Publisher, Is Dead at 67

abstract: Lawrence Boadt, Roman Catholic priest, publisher and Bible scholar, dies at age 67; photo (M)
